trans-unit.source: Use https as protocol: You can't call the http protocol when your page is running on https. So here you can decide to use the same protocol.
Link to Google Maps API: Leave empty to use default API. You only need to fill this field if you want to use an older or beta version.
Google Maps ApiKey: Visit https://console.developers.google.com Create a new project for Google Maps JavaScript API and insert here the retrieved ApiKey.
Default Latitude: If you leave this empty Google Maps points to somewhere over the ocean on startup. So it's better to enter some coordinates: http://universimmedia.pagesperso-orange.fr/geo/loc.htm
Default Longitude: If you leave this empty Google Maps points to somewhere over the ocean on startup. So it's better to enter some coordinates: http://universimmedia.pagesperso-orange.fr/geo/loc.htm
Default Radius (in meters): When using collection type "Radius" you should set a default radius. Else you just see one single point
Stroke Color: You can set a border color for a overly here
Stroke Opacity: If you set this to 1, you can't see th map behind the border. So it's better to find a value between 0.3 and 0.6
Stroke Weight (in pixel): How thick the border of the overlay should be? A good value is 1 or 2
Fill Color: Which color the overlay should have?
Fill Opacity: If you set this to 1, you can't see th map behind the overlay. So it's better to find a value between 0.3 and 0.6. But it should be less than the value of strokeOpacity
